allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Tarot card reading website

Features:
- Multiple spread types \(1, 2, 3, 4, 10, 12 cards\)
- Beautiful tarot card UI with animations
- AI-powered predictions using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini
- Firebase analytics integration
- Responsive mobile design
- Image save functionality

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix AI prediction with serverless function

- Add Vercel serverless function to secure API key
- Update ai_functions.js to use serverless endpoint
- Add environment variable configuration
- Update .gitignore to exclude sensitive files

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
